documents.document:
my fitness

something I am feeling....Since taking up walking I have learned...........My grandfather started walking five miles a day when he was 60, now he's 97 years old and we have no idea where the hell he is,so maybe I better walker faster, to get a head start!

Since taking up walking I have learned...........I like long walks, especially when they are taken
by people who annoy me, need to take a long hike to get away from me before I.................
another reason I took up walking, is so that I could hear heavy breathing again, is that heavy breathing mine or yours?

Since taking up walking I have learned...........I have to walk early in the morning, before my brain figures out what I'm doing...

When I joined a health gym last year,I spent about $ 250 and never lost a kg! Apparently you have to go there, to loose weight!

Since taking up walking I have learned...........Every time I hear the dirty word 'exercise', I wash my mouth out with chocolate, which contributes to my flabby thighs, which fortunately my stomach covers, so I have nothing to hide!

Since taking up walking I have learned...........The advantage of exercising every day is that when you die, they'll say, 'Well, she looks good doesn't she? and no one argues about a dead person!

Touch

The manufacture of a high-performance of touch or hug with minimal impact on a person in the environment at home or in the work place can change a person's day throughout their entire life.
Keep our friends and their families' safety in mind, with a shoulder touch or the touch of a hand can maintain the highest quality of friendship standards by ensuring companionship, are just as effective as, if not better than, fiends who greet you and keep walking as they pass you by......................
Be open to new ideas, original thinking, and better ways of doing things.
Demonstrate transparency in dealing with your friends by introducing others expand ideas and friendships in your surrounding community.
Enrich the lives of our friends by offering a fun, dynamic time.........
joy

rain simply rain

An Inspiring voice of the rain is pelting down, rattling my peaceful sleep with the rumbling thunder clapping at my window sill,
Who goes there, nothing but wizened old trees blowing in the light breeze, with moon beams dancing on the wet grass,
What adorning leaves I see blowing in the breeze, I squeeze my face on the window pane just a little more and watch the dripping torrents of liquid rain, gently cascading down my window sill,
Tap tap the rain makes filling me with joy as the moon beam curtains drape in the sky, a flash reveals a golden eye, as the moon beckons me, with Diamond droplets once again racing and cascading and tapping on my window sill………..
joy

life after death

life after death
"Do you believe in life after death?" the boss asked one of his employees.

"Yes, Sir." the new recruit replied.

"Well, then, that makes everything just fine," the boss went on. "After you left early yesterday to go to your grandmother's funeral, she stopped in to see you

I will not punish myself into change..........

I will not punish myself into change,
I will not whip myself into shape, with crazy diets and low self talk.
But I will learn to love myself into well-being, positive self talk of well being by,
surrounding myself with good happy people who support my well being in my of journey of life.

joy

I contantly observe that everything is the result of change

I contantly observe that everything is the result of change,
getting use to thinking that change can sometimes benefit us is something else,
Nature loves to change existing forms and make new ones with storms, death and new beginnings,
just maybe, I could have more lessons in nature to learn from and enjoy the changes I have not predicted in life experiences!!

To develop a positive mindset is one of the most powerful

To develop a positive mindset is one of the most powerful life strategies there is. Using powerful positive thinking techniques, visualizations and positive affirmations,makes it possible to achieve whatever you want. Professionals and business people can use these techniques to develop personal power or gain a competitive edge. On a personal level positive mine sets will transform your life, your health and renew the joy and passion for life. Imagine waking up each morning, bursting with excitement, energy and joy for the new day! You must have positive support buddy systems and positive self talk, even if you record how you sound through the day and play it back!
joy

My final mystery is to myself

My final mystery is to myself, I cannot predict the future but need to understand my past and present to understand oneself,
My final mystery is when you hate someone whom you really wish to love, but whom you cannot love, is another mystery within oneself, where as the love hate relationship begins!.
True mystery of the world is what I see as visible, how I react and how I am, but sadly I am not the invisible, so without mysteries, life would be very dull indeed.
What would be left to strive for if everything were known?”
Mystery is at the heart of creativity and that surprise you werent expecting from a friend indeed.
My final mystery is to myself.

I just had a wake up call about shampoo I am using!

Hey I just discovered some thing very important, the shampoo I use in the shower is the reason I gain weight!

I discovered when I wash my hair, the shampoo runs down my whole body, and printed very clearly on the shampoo label is this warning, "FOR EXTRA VOLUME AND BODY." No WONDER I have been gaining weight!!!

Well I got rid of that shampoo immedietly and I am going to start using "Finish Dish Washing Liquid"
instead, because Its label reads:
"DISSOLVES FAT THAT IS OTHERWISE DIFFICULT TO REMOVE."

Problem now solved, now I may NEVER get out the shower! If I don't answer the phone, I'll be in the shower!
Joy

I happened to chance and see the truth,

I happened to chance and see the truth, fed the lies once again that you told,
Years of pain, tears that rain down my face the more I hear, the more I die a little each day with your lies,
I happened to chance and see the truth,
Distorted mind you said I had and distorted truth you burden me with and try to put the blame on me,
I shed the tears that could fill an ocean but they dried before you, my now lifeless eyes, a former self,
I happened to chance and to see the truth.
I watched dazed,I replaced my soul, who replaced me and finally I shall replace you,
I happened to chance and see the truth,
I saw a vision to help myself, to save me, save me, from a destructive life, with you,
I happened to chance and see the truth,
I saw a dream of passion no more, pain....deceit, but to embrace the darkness of the past, free my desire, my chains you have around me,
I happened to chance and see the truth,
I feel enslaved by mistakes I've made in life, when I look into your eyes and see, a chance to see the truth, but your eyes have lied so many times before, I can't believe you anymore, your lifeless eyes a part of me, I happened to chance and see the truth,
joy

Gone from here, I disappear. Away from pain, away from fear

Save me from my automatic pilot life

Save me from my automatic pilot life, that has no past but, to recreate my present,
I now want to forget the past and remember the times, I use to smile with no worries,
now it seems so long in passing,

I want to feel strong once again, so look in to my eyes, and see my pain that I have left behind,

I am peering down the river and see myself playing, laughing a younger version of myself; skipping the stones of lifes hardship that come everyday once again finding a happy and contented part in life,

I now look into the river of life, I am now living again, I am touching the water, grabbing my reflection and freeze with my perfect reflection staring back with a new inner peace,

now I wish to consume and establish all I used to be, wish myself back to health, respect for my own truth and see life with new eyes.................

are you there?

My lights are on but there is no one home, are you there?
I'm the type of girl that should never be left alone, not knowing where you are ? are you there?

I thought just for a moment, I heard you whisper my name? are you there?
a slight breeze caught the Curtin, it fluttered back and fourth whispering my name, are you there?
just maybe you are there, I can feel your presence,hear you whispering my name, I don't know what is real any-more, am I real or in a dream? or maybe, the lights are on, but no one's home.
joy

The Lost Moment

I felt lost the moment you spoke to me, that day, that time, there was something different about that day,
I saw the wind blow; saw the leaves scuttle back and forth, but could no longer hear your voice, we could never catch that thread, that moment again,
I lost all sense of direction in my thoughts, there was something different that day........
The moment I saw you...the moment you broke my heart.........

The sky was the same old sky, the wind in the trees beckoning me to move on, there was something different about that day, the same old warmth from the sun but I felt so cold........frozen in a time warp,
I saw your lips move, but could no longer hear your voice, I felt lost the moment you spoke to me that day that time,

My vision blurred, but now I see, clouds from heaven rained down upon my earth, no longer was I in control, of my senses, my being, falling just for me, Engulfing my pain, there was something different about that day, How I wish I could tell, how I felt the moment you lost me in time,

There was something different that day, about the way the wind blew; the way the sun shone in your hair, the way you moved, the way your smile looked into my soul, I was truly lost that moment, The last time the moment I saw you...
Joy

Are you ready for Christmas?

I do like Christmas, but not the society that makes you feel the cost of the present is most important!
Christmas has already become too commercialized for me and many others, as the pressure builds and the cost on credits cards and cash get spent! There’s huge pressure on people, particularly parents, to spend huge sums of money on presents for loved ones, on entertaining or for entertaining family at Christmas time. For many families, coping with the cost of Christmas requires money to be put on credit cards or an overdraft to be run up and then this needs to somehow be paid off in the new year, doom and gloom when it can’t be done! In the current troubled economic environment, this is a burden that many families could really do without. Interest rates souring and job guarantee are not what they once were!
To stand at a check out and watch someone assessing a purchase on two different credit cards was a sad moment for me to see. Then when you hear a discussion on how much should you spend on a present, sets you at which class you come from in society! Granted some people don't need to spend all of their money, but you like to be a part of society and feel you belong, and the want becomes a need. So many of us just follows what the next person does. Most people just get entangled up with what everybody else is doing and the media do have a lot more influence than we give them credit for. Some parents spend so much on their children and family to keep them from feeling out of place; (keeping up with the jones) we end up spending far more than we should or would have planned!
I do like Christmas, once again, but not the society that makes you feel the cost of the present is most important! Write a budget, make some home-made chocolates etc or plan ahead. Are you going to be financial in 2012 with what you spent? I will be ok, will you this Christmas?

you dont call me my pet name anymore.....

You dont call me by my old familiar pet name any more,
You dont Speak to me in the easy way which you always used
You dont talk any more through the night, till day break.........
We dont Laugh as we always laughed at the little jokes till the tears flowed......
We dont seem to enjoy together any more.............

We use to Play, smile, think of each other,you pray for me and I for you............
how can we become a household word once again? that always was, once more.
Call my name, behold my love, before it slips away ....
Without a trace of love left behind, my shadow will always be remembered,
Life means so much to me with memories of you and I and all that it ever was meant to be,
dont allow our love to disappear any more, to become but a broken memory,

I dont want to be out of sight and out of mind because I am, but waiting for you, is this our interval?
are you Somewhere very near, or Just around the corner, waiting my love?
joy

I often get told that nothing changes,

I am often told nothing changes,
give your desired words to a friend indeed and say them out loud to someone you trust,
tenderly gaze into the eye of someone you care for (5 seconds or beyond)
say hello to someone and stop as you speak!
expose your craving anyway you must, reveal your intentions, come clean, stand there, feel your vulnerability , wait and hear what they say in return before you speak, describe your dream, in detail, clarify what you're afraid of and give faith to the opposite.
if you dont dare no one will care.................
joy

Timid we are timid we stay......

If you hold back all your life without a true friend of experience then alone you will stay.........life is a risk,
Blow off the past and ask for what you want, unzip the casing of your personality, burst out and let that inner layer explode into a feeling into the air, of letting go, do something for another being, without any obligations or expectations in return, the feel is the same as an orgasm!
It is a terrifying relief to merge out in front, melting the edges of your being and becoming vulnerable to another and contributing punctuations of ecstasy of everyday happiness in deepening knowledge of the unknown, break out I know the fear of the unknown , let go and share to someone you know, love and trust, if you make a wrong judgement then see it as a learning curve, try someone else!!!
joy

Thought for today

Giving is better than receiving because giving starts the receiving process,
there is only one way to truly receive is to enrich yourself and enjoy your journey of prosperity,
is to first give a little of yourself and the universe will provide in its own time and the laws of gravity will demonstrate in the most profound way,
One that withholds emotionally and physically will suffer in this life journey,
bring a blessing to a stranger or someone in need as you water kindness your kindness will flourish in return,
you will be enriched with prosperity, this comes in many formats of wealth, friends, jobs, etc
Joy

Tax time

My Tax Returns

Yesterday I got my Tax Return "Returned"

I was trying to get a jump on doing my taxes this year,

however, the ATO sent my Tax Return back!!

I guess it was because of my response to the line, which said:

"List All Dependents"

So, I replied:

1/2 million illegal immigrants
1/4 million crack heads
2 million unemployable people living on welfare

1 million people in over 123 prisons
and
353 fools in Parliament House and the Senate.

Apparently, this was NOT acceptable..

So I sent it back with a question "Did I forget someone?"

Lipstick on the mirror

According to a news report, a certain private school in Sydney's Eastern Suburbs was recently faced with an unusual problem ..

A number of the girls were beginning to use lipstick and would put it on in the bathroom. That was fine, but after they put on their lipstick they would press their lips to the mirror leaving dozens of little lip prints .

Every night the maintenance man would remove them and the next day the girls would put them back . Finally the Headmistress decided that something had to be done ... She called all the girls to the bathroom and met them there with the maintenance man .
She explained that all these lip prints were causing a major problem for the custodian who had to clean the mirrors every night (you can just imagine the yawns from the little princesses) ..

To demonstrate how difficult it had been to clean the mirrors, she asked the maintenance man to show the girls how much effort was required. He took out a long-handled squeegee, dipped it in the toilet bowl, and cleaned the mirror with it.
The silence was broken by a large number of gasps, a few girls vomited and apparently someone fainted . Since then there have been no lip prints on the mirror .

There are teachers . . . And then there are educators.
